text: kl nfs la bdd 'an tdhwq almwt, wbhdha yarjie jmye alkhalq 'iilaa rbhm; lyhasbhm. wa'iinama tuffawn 'ujurakum ealaa 'aemalakum wafiat ghyr mnqwst yawm alqyamt, faman akrmh rabih wnjjah min alnaar wadkhlh aljanat faqad nal ghayat ma ytlb. wama alhayat aldunya 'iilaa mtet zaylt, fala tghtrru bha
